comment: This class can be very boring. Most of the tests it seemed like came from the book. I didn't read the book as much as I should have which is why I did okay in this class. She puts the PowerPoint Chapters online. Read the PowerPoints, and get the book. I took the Friday Class 11:00-1:45. Interesting class though.  She does NOT take attendance.

She loves to talk about whatever she thinks is important and gets off track during lectures often. She reads directly from her notes and power points that are basically a condensed version of the textbook. You can read the textbook and never go to class and pass easily. Definitely would not take her again; this is the most boring class I've had.

Not what I expected, but much better! Professor Riley's knowledge about the topic and interest in informing her students made the class very interesting! She tests on book content and class information, which is not in the book, so take as much notes as possible. If you do that and read the book chapters, which are easy, you'll ace the class!
This was my favorite class! Really changed some of my thinking on social issues. Workload was reasonable. Lectures were defenitely NOT boring!Very very nice and helpful professor.Take this class!

You'd better come to class if you want to get an A because she doesn't just teach from the book. Class is boring because if she's not lecturing from her own notes, she's reading off a PowerPoint written from the text. Only 3 grades (2 are tests!). Not very helpful and gets confused by what students say sometimes. Long wait on grades. Did not enjoy.

Extremely boring lectures, reads from her notes and powerpoints. Grade is made up of weekly discussions, Midterm and final. If you do the discussions and study for the midterm and final getting an A is not hard.

She reads from a PowerPoint verbatim all class. The PowerPoints are copyrighted by Pearson, who also created our assigned book, so they're almost identical. She is passionate about the subject matter, but when questioned about it, often did not have an answer. She only takes 3 grades, so you must do very well on the tests. Long wait time on grades.

She is a very nice teacher and was extremely involved in the subject she tought. the only grades in there were disscusions on d2l, midterm, and final. She often has notes that she reads off of instead of the ppts. there where many questions on the test that were from her notes so although attendance is not mandatory it is highly advised.Good luck!

3 grades: discussion board, midterm, & final. POST on the discussion board (don't be lazy!). Text is easy to read. Attendance not taken, but you will learn a lot if you go! Tests are based on text and class discussions. Don't hesitate to ask her questions. Very nice lady and she definitely knows her stuff! I'm a first year and got an A. TAKE HER!
She knows her stuff.  Pretty easy to work with.  Should attend class if you expect to get an 'A'.  Test covers information in the book and from her lectures, which are different.

Dr. Riley is one of those rare professors who thoroughly enjoys what she does so you can't help getting into what she is talking about. She goes out of her way to make sure you understand the material. Highly recommend!
Great class! Great Professor! She made me think about social issues in ways I had never considered. Loved the class. Got an A.

Even though I made an A in this class, the teacher was horrible!! All she did was read from her notes, which I could have done. Her tests are not based on what she teaches. She accused me of cheating on a paper because I wrote too well for an undergrad student. I went to the dean to complain about her. If you can avoid it, don't take her class!

Whatever you do, do not take her! She teaches very poorly. Her tests are horrible. They contain multiple double negatives and trick questions. She is not clear about what she expects and treats students as if they are ridiculously unintelligent, repeatedly informing them that she has been doing this for a very long time. She knows how to do researc
OMG if you can stay away from her CRJ  research class!! She does not teach anything, be prepared to teach yourself, the exams are very very difficult...and the final paper is a nightmare.

Honestly, this class was pretty tough. I somehow managed an A but I had to work my butt off to keep up w/the chapters & study, complete the online discussions on time, do the final paper, & attend every single class discussion (which had nothing to do w/the test material!) If ur even a bit lazy or don't like to read - DONT enroll w/this teacher!!!

The absolute worst teacher I have ever had to suffer a semester long class with. She does not teach what needs to be taught for the test, but rather goes off on many 45 min tangents where at most there will be 5 questions from on the test.  You are forced to do 3 online discussions and a chapter quiz online every week throughout the semester.

She is the most borng professor ever! She counts attendance for a grade everyday and if you fall asleep that also counts as an absence. She lectures the entire class while everyone struggles to keep awake. Her test ared impossible even if you do read the book and got to class! The class basically sucks.

I think that Dr. Riley is an excellent professor who allows students to see many topics from different angles.  During the first class she said that we would look at many different topics and by the end of the semester you wouldn't know how you feel about any of them. This class opened my mind and made me think more critically. Earned an A.

do  not take this late her class is boring she doesn't let u talk and her test are very hard to pass hte test you should read evevry chapter and even that will not help sher expects you to go out and rent some dumb movie from the video store and alot of her test questions she makes up has nothing  to do with her lecture lectures.
She kept the class very interesting. I was worried about it being boring from other people, but she has a deep interest in serial killers, so it was awesome.
DO NOT TAKE HER CLASS!  SO BORING AND HARD. SHE TAKES ATTENDANCE AND COUNTS AS A GRADE
This professor is the most liberal (socialist) I have ever seen.  I would not recommend her to anyone.  She wont let you speak if she knows you are going to disagree withher.

She doesn't take attendance, but lectures aren't boring. Her tests aren't hard as long as you go to class and take good notes (she includes questions from lectures on her tests). Just study and go to class, and you'll do well.
Her lectures are boring! Her tests are hard! If you want to do good in her class you have to read every chapter.
